captions.text:
Ladies and gentlemen, let's get to
"Improbable Scenes", everybody plays!

You wrote scene suggestions
that are in this red box,

I'll read them and whoever has
an idea with your suggestions,
will step up and do it, like:

Dude, what are you doing
with the orange squeezer?

Wow!
I never thought about it!

- What are you doing? - Trying
to squeeze an idea, it's hard!

It was getting orange,
so I figured...

- I'm outta webs!
- Where are your webs?

I climbed the waterspout, down
came the rain... And washed me out!

Out came the sun
and dried up all the rain...

Way Out Closet!
For a classy outing!

The new Love Closet!
Fits more than one lover!
This new samba has just arrived
Holy shit, how come she's still alive

On your right, you can see
a painting by Dickasso.

On your right you can see the
classic Picasso painting, The Kiss,
on its right, The Kiss in The Carnival,

and on its right, The Really Hot
Kiss Getting To The Third Base,
where we can't see a damn thing...
And this is a Picasso sculpture.

- Is that a Picasso?
- Influenced by Aleijadinho!

Come here! Come here!
Come here!

I'm paraguayan and
I'm here to kill you!
